H0.text: Which Australian won the men’s singles title at Wimbledon in 1956 and 1957. Rod Laver

H1.text: Which Australian won the men’s singles title at Wimbledon in 1956 and 1957. Roy Emerson

H2.text: Which Australian won the men’s singles title at Wimbledon in 1956 and 1957. Ken Rosewall

H3.text: Which Australian won the men’s singles title at Wimbledon in 1956 and 1957. LEW HOAD

A4.text: Laver captured his first Wimbledon singles crown in 1961, beating Chuck McKinley in straight sets in the final, which lasted just 53 minutes.

A5.text: Lew Hoad defeated Ken Rosewall in the final, 6–2, 4–6, 7–5, 6–4, to win the gentlemen's singles tennis title.

A6.text: Rod Laver was defeated in the first round by Orlando Sirola.
